pr_title: [ Refactor ] Split TcpServerConnectionManager into itself and TcpServerConnectionManagerBase

timeline.bodyText: implements ServerConnectionManager is redundant here (the base class also implements this interface)
timeline.author: vbekiaris

timeline.message:
Refactor: extract TcpServerConnectionManagerBase class from TcpServerConnectionManager as to remove
fan-out complexity from this class

Refactor: extract TcpServerConnectionManagerBase class from TcpServerConnectionManager as to remove
fan-out complexity from this class
